question:
Which among the following is/ are the effects of the Prajamandal movement?
a) People realized the significance of Non-violence
b) Accelerated the process of merging native princely states into Odisha
c) British rule was eradicated from Odisha
d) Ended the monarchy in Odisha
Select the correct option from the codes given below
explanation: Consequences of Prajamandal Movements are- People realized the significance of Non-violence, Accelerated the process of merging native princely states into Odisha, Ended the monarchy in Odisha,Â  King became tolerant towards people.
